text: hello
i'm kurt kufeld vice president of aws
platform
which includes identity billing
and the aws fraud prevention
organization
i'm excited to announce the general
availability of amazon fraud detector
amazon fraud detector is a new service
that makes it easy
to use machine learning to detect online
fraud in real time and at scale
it is based on the same technology and
methods that my organization uses to
combat fraud
across aws and amazon in this video
i'll share the background on the problem
of fraud and the history of fighting it
at amazon explain how amazon fraud
detector helps detect
and prevent fraud and share some of the
results our customers are seeing
with fraud detector let's start with the
problem in online businesses alone
tens of billions of dollars are lost
worldwide each year
to fraudulent activity and the problem
is growing
for example new account fraud grew by 28
and it's not just a financial issue
however fraud attacks
damage organizations reputations they
impact the experience for our legitimate
customers
and they erode our customer trust at
amazon and aws
customer trust is our most important
asset it takes years to gain
in just minutes to lose which is why
fraud prevention continues to be
a strategic area of investment for
amazon
for the last two decades amazon has
invested in fraud detection across all
of its online businesses
from aws to our online retailers like
zappos
the experiences of our risk teams spans
a wide variety
of online fraud types such as payments
including stolen credit cards
account takeovers including username and
password compromises
and abuse scenarios such as promotion
and free tier abuse
through the years we have also invested
heavily in machine learning
solve for many of the common challenges
that face fraud prevention teams
including
adapting to continuously evolving
pattern of threats
reducing the volume of alerts that need
manual review
and scaling operations quickly and
economically in speaking with aws
customers we discovered that they were
facing many of the same challenges that
we faced
and we're looking for flexible and
scalable solutions and so we developed
amazon fraud detector
a fully managed ml service for detecting
online fraud
we built it to leverage our learnings
and best practices fighting fraud
we designed it to overcome the
challenges of online fraud detection
and we developed it not just for our own
internal use
but also to bring value to our customers
here's how amazon fraud detector works
first you build a model by uploading
your historical data and training the
model in just a few clicks
the data is needed to identify fraud
patterns unique to your business
once the data is uploaded the service
automatically inspects and enriches the
data
it selects the best features and
algorithms for your data it trains and
tunes your model
it boosts model performance using
patterns of fraud learn from amazon's
businesses
and it outputs a high performing fraud
detection model custom
to your fraud scenario the next step is
to deploy a detector
which contains your model along with
simple logic rules which are used to
turn the output of the model
a risk score between zero and a thousand
into a decision
for example you can set rules that
events such as account registrations
with low risk scores are approved while
ones with medium
and high risk scores are flagged to be
manually reviewed by fraud analysts
once the detector is deployed you can
start generating predictions
and detecting fraud in real time to do
this
the data is sent to the detector api at
the time of an event such as your user
registration
the detector will analyze the data
captured during the event using your
custom model and rules
and send back a fraud prediction and
outputs based on your decision logic
detectors can be built and deployed for
use across a wide variety of scenarios
allowing fraud detector to fit the needs
of each business model in use case
let's take a look at some examples
godaddy is committed to preventing
fraudulent accounts and they are
continuously bolstering their
capabilities to automatically detect
such accounts during sign up they
recently began using amazon fraud
detector
and are pleased that it offers low cost
of implementation and a self-service
approach
to building a machine learning model
that is customized to their business
the model can be easily deployed and
used in their new account process
without impacting the sign-up experience
for legitimate customers
the model they've built with amazon
fraud detector is able to detect likely
fraudulent sign-ups immediately
so they are very pleased with the
results and are looking forward to
accomplishing more
truvo is a payment service provider that
has to monitor payment transactions
around the clock for fraud
they considered various third-party
rules engines but found them too complex
to integrate with and too costly to
operate
amazon fraud detector allowed them to
build and deploy a detector in just 30
minutes
and thanks to pre-integrations with
services like cloudwatch
and cloudtrail they were also able to
implement cost-effective payment
monitoring that scaled to their
production volume in just a few weeks
earlier threat detection and rapid time
to value are just two of the benefits we
see our customers experiencing
with amazon fraud detector and we're
just getting started and with that i'll
wrap it up
if you're ready to learn more the best
way is to go to the amazon fraud
detector section of the aws website
there you can get documentation and
details about the service read more
about other use cases that it can
address
and try it yourself by signing in with
your aws account
with pay-as-you-go pricing and no
upfront fees in a two month free trial
you can get started immediately with
amazon fraud detector
thank you for watching and enjoy your
experience with amazon fraud detector
